feed.title: Modify Watches: Popular Products
feed.subtitle: A list of the popular products at Modify Watches.

entry.title: Black Polka Dot Face
entry.content:
The Black Polka Dot watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match the this design with any other straps from your Modify collection. The face is made from a scratch-resistant polycarbonate and stainless steel.

Price: $30.00
entry.isc:description: The Black Polka Dot watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match the this design with any other straps from your Modify collection. The face is made from a scratch-resistant polycarbonate and stainless steel.

entry.title: Black Magic
entry.content:
The 'Black Magic' comes with one Polka Black watch face and one Black strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection.
